au.com.cybersearch2.classyjpa.persist

Class ClassAnalyser

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.com.cybersearch2.classyjpa.persist.ClassAnalyser

  • public class ClassAnalyser
extends Object
    ClassAnalyser Adds to com.j256.ormlite.misc.JavaxPersistence to support OneToMany and ManyToOne annotations. Duplicates some DatabaseFieldConfig code for processing @ForeignCollection annotation.
    Author:
    Andrew Bowley 18/07/2014

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ClassAnalyser.ForeignFieldData
      ForeignFieldData Contains foreignFieldMap and foreignCollectionMap used to map foreign field column name to field name and assign foreignTableConfig to foreignCollection fields

        Parameters:
        clazz - Entity class
        foreignFieldData - ForeignFieldData to collect foreign field and foreign collection data
        Returns:

      • extractOneToManyField

        protected String extractOneToManyField(com.j256.ormlite.field.DatabaseFieldConfig fieldConfig,
                           Annotation annotation,
                           Field field)
        Returns "mappedBy" attribute for OneToMany annotation. Also handles "fetch" value of "EAGER".
        Parameters:
        fieldConfig - DatabaseFieldConfig object of current field
        annotation - Annotation object of current field
        field - Field object
        Returns:
        "mappedBy" value or empty String if not found or empty

      • getUnitName

        public static String getUnitName(Class<?> clazz)
        Utility method to return unitName of class with PersistenceUnit annotation
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class which is expect to have PersistenceUnit annotation
        Returns:
        unitName
        Throws:
        javax.persistence.PersistenceException - if unitName not specified or empty

        Returns:
